title: Kai’Sai
body:
I was playing Miss Fortune (yea I know, I didn’t want to play her) and I was doing overall well that game. My team goes in, does their stun bullshit and Is being focused. I’m back line, let out an ult, and then Kai’Sai being a adc/assassin (yea I know that’s the assassins point), takes some damage, but breaks away and deletes me in a manner of a few seconds (she had decent CS, and kills, not super fed ) 
I don’t really think she is that broken , but what do you guys think? Does she need a buff or nerf? (I think she could really use a small nerf as her damage can build up in a manner of seconds.) how do you guys feel about having an assassin that can also be adc? There must be a reason she is meta rn  and people gravitate towards banning her.
